19.ara-name: كتاب الأضاحى عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Hanash:That 'Ali used to slaughter two male sheep, one for the Prophet (ﷺ) and the other for himself. When this was mentioned to him, he said: "He ordered me to" - meaning the Prophet (ﷺ) - "So I will never leave it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأُضْحِيَةِ عَنِ الْمَيِّتِ،
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Slaughtering On Behalf Of The Deceased
